item.description:
Road trip! Let's visit the Mark Twain House and Museum in Hartford, www.marktwainhouse.org . Tickets are $16 for adults and parking is free. There is a discount for groups of 10 or more when booked >= 14 days in advance. It's a 2-hour, 100-mile drive from Lowell, so let's stop for lunch along somewhere along the way. I'll suggest Traveler Restaurant, Union, CT, just over the border. Books and food, what else do you need? :-)

10:00 leave Lowell
one hour lunch stop (suggestions?)
1:00 arrive at Mark Twain House and Museum
The Museum closes at 5:30 so we could stop for dinner on the way back.
item.name: Visit the Mark Twain House in Hartford
